channel.title: Comments on: Using a Dedicated Administrator Connection via SSMS
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Robert
item.dc:creator: Robert
item.description: Intellisense will immediately try to establish another connection and silently fail - but you'll get 4 Errors in the Instance Log. Enough for purists to avoid SSMS for DAC.
item.content:encoded: Intellisense will immediately try to establish another connection and silently fail – but you’ll get 4 Errors in the Instance Log. Enough for purists to avoid SSMS for DAC.
